biography: Tommy is a rising star from Espoo Ringside Golf, making his mark on the competitive golf scene.  A consistent performer, he has steadily improved his game since his first appearance at the Hector Trophée in 2024.

He's already demonstrated a keen understanding of the strategic challenges presented by this prestigious invitational, and his participation in both the 2024 and 2025 tournaments showcases his dedication and ambition. While he hasn't yet claimed victory in the Hector Trophée, nor secured the coveted Victor trophy, his persistent presence and refined skillset suggest that this is just a matter of time.

Tommy's steady improvement, coupled with his experience at this tournament, promises an exciting performance this year.  All eyes will be on him as he competes against some of the best golfers in the field.
